```{r shared_util, include= F}
read_wrap <-function(fname,wid = 100){
  s= readLines(fname)
  s = gsub('\t','  ',s)
  
  # sout = 
  idx = nchar(s) > wid
  
  slst <- as.list(s)
  # browser()
  slst[idx]<-lapply(slst[idx],function(x)strwrap(x,wid))
  unlist(slst)
  
}
```
